adrFormatAddress: 135 Bowery, New York, NY 10002, USA

editorialSummary.text: Sophisticated Japanese restaurant offering omakase sushi & BBQ highlighting premium meats.

originalText.text:
We'd go back! We had a good experience and things were as advertised for the Tuesday dinner special - however they don't advertise the Sapporo part when you arrive. You have to "know."

Everything we had was very fresh! They were able to accommodate us although we did not have a reservation. Happy about that. The space is cute, and the bathroom was clean.

They do limit the length of time you can place orders, so get what you feel you need promptly. Some of the meat dishes have a marinade on them and I loved that. The other meats didn't have seasoning but there is a powdered seasoning and some sauces at the table. I do wish the menu had more vegetable items - they were very limited. Also, having fried rice and a dessert menu would be neat.

Perfect for a group because the price is fixed, especially with the Tuesday night deal that includes select beverages.

originalText.text:
I ended up eating here today by mistake with my partner. Our server was very friendly and quick, and before we could figure out that we were in the wrong restaurant, we had waters and ordering instructions and an iPad was handed to us to order on. We stayed. It was okay.

All you can eat grill was $49 on a holiday. The selection of shellfish and vegetables was quite limited. Was it worth the money? If you are hungry and are an omnivore, yes. If you limit your diet to certain foods like my partner and myself.....meh.

originalText.text:
Had to check this new japanese bbq out cause I always loved japanese bbq and here's my thought out honest review ‚ò∫Ô∏è

Customer service is top notch. Went there around 3:30 and even though our reservation was for 4:15 they seated us right away. They have booths so it was cozy. The music wasn't too loud so you can have meaningful conversations with people. They have an iPad in the table and that's where you would place your orders which is convenient and they do bring the food out right away.

Same as what others have said, they forget some of your orders but you just have to let them know that you're still waiting for *order ...* and they bring it right away.

The meats weren't as good as I would like them to be. It's a new restaurant so maybe they'll expand their menus and add more seasoning to their beef. Their fried siumai was okay, the gyoza dumplings were good though, however I'm not a fan of their calamari.

Their sushis amazing! We had the gyu ichiro (gotta try their own sushi yk) and it was great.

They also had my favorite mio sparkling sake so üëè maybe chill it before serving it tho ‚ò∫Ô∏è it tastes better üòÑ

Lastly, they do replace the grill but they don't oil it, one of the servers gave me butter so i can oil the grill which was nice of him to do but i highly suggest that they do it in the future (meat sticks in the grill. Unless i guess you want yours well well well done then its fine)

The service was amazing. They took our empty dishes out right away and whenever we order they bring it out. Maybe we were fortunate that they weren't busy at the time but we didn't have problems with waiting for food or anything.

originalText.text:
Combo AYCE BBQ and Sushi / Sashimi joint on Bowery.

The good:
- our service was quick, when we ordered, it was out to us very fast.
- service was good.
- decent sashimi and sushi
- the BBQ meats was good as well.

The not so good:
- I can't really find any fault with this place, the only exception was a personal one, hard to eat both Sashimi and BBQ at 1 sitting.

Overall: very good value for the price, decent quality of both fish and meats at all you can have for 50$.   For me personally, it was tough to have both kinds of food at one single sitting, if you have the stomach for it, this place is a good value for the quantity and quality of food.

originalText.text: High quality sashimi and meat, with very fast, attentive and friendly service. There are some issues with the ordering system as mentioned in previous reviews, but the staff were proactive to follow up and make sure the food arrived quickly. Also descriptions of the dishes would help a lot, particularly the sushi rolls. Overall a great experience!

text.text: High quality sashimi and meat, with very fast, attentive and friendly service. There are some issues with the ordering system as mentioned in previous reviews, but the staff were proactive to follow up and make sure the food arrived quickly. Also descriptions of the dishes would help a lot, particularly the sushi rolls. Overall a great experience!
